programs.programDescription: The Fire Cadet Company 511 program offers young adults an opportunity to explore a career in the fire service.
programs.activityDescription: Young adults seeking a career as a Seattle firefighter can apply to participate in our department's cadet programs. Participants must be in good physical condition and have a strong desire to be a Seattle Firefighter. The program includes physical ability tests, attendance expectations, and encourages applications from diverse communities.
programs.cost: $95 initial cost and $10 per month in membership dues. Additional fees for special trips and events. Financial assistance is available.
